content.rendered:
Welcome to the Office of Institutional Research web site at the University of La Verne. Our mission is to advance the University through research and assessment, and build a culture of evidence to continuously improve the quality of teaching, learning, and delivery of services.

We hope you will be able to find here the information that you need using the resources below.

For any information needs not addressed by the following resources, please submit a Data Inquiry Form.

Table of Contents

  • Campus Climate
  • Data Dictionary
  • Data Resource Guide
  • Reports/Publications
  • Surveys and Results
  • Traditional Undergraduate Retention and Graduation Rates
    • Retention Rates (2009-2021)
    • Graduation Rates (2012-2021)
    • Breakdown by Ethnicity and Gender (2008-2019)
